name: items
description: Array of option items for the select.

params.name: value
params.description: Value for the option item. Defaults to an empty string.

params.name: selected
params.description: Sets the option as the selected.

params.name: disabled
params.description: Sets the option item as disabled.

params.name: attributes
params.description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the option.

name: errorMessage
description: Options for the error message component. The error message component will not display if you use a falsy value for `errorMessage`, for example `false` or `null`.

name: classes
description: Classes to add to the select.

name: attributes
description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the select.
